title: FS: T206 COBB Bat on SGC 20

posts.post_title: FS: T206 COBB Bat on SGC 20
posts.post_content:
Nice card, pinhole knocks grade. $SOLD NET shipped. PM or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if interested - thanks!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=481592&d=1633404837[/IMG]
Guess SGC does not know the difference between "Bat on" and "Bat off" shoulder based on the flip.
Do you have a picture of the back of the card?
